name: MERGEALOT
description:
MERGEALOT is a game where soldiers have the ability to join together as one. Play as two heroes who can move and fight individually, or join them together as one epic hero. Defend your city by defeating foes and prevent them from growing stronger.

Input
WASD/Arrowkey = move characters around
Spacebar = attack
Enter = merge
